meanings.definition: The quality of being artistic or creative.
meanings.sent1: Her artsiness shone through in her colorful paintings.
meanings.sent2: The gallery was filled with artsiness, from the sculptures to the photographs.
meanings.sent3: His artsiness was evident in the way he arranged his bookshelf by color.
meanings.sent4: The artsiness of her dance performance left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The artsiness of the garden was truly breathtaking, with flowers of every color imaginable.

meanings.definition: The use of artistic elements or techniques in a work of art.
meanings.sent1: The artist's painting displayed a perfect balance of artsiness and skill.
meanings.sent2: The film director incorporated artsiness into every frame of the movie.
meanings.sent3: The cake decorator's artsiness was evident in the intricate designs on the cupcakes.
meanings.sent4: The artsiness of the music video added a new layer of depth to the song.
meanings.sent5: The artsiness of the costume design brought the characters to life on stage.

meanings.definition: A tendency to appreciate or engage in the arts.
meanings.sent1: Her artsiness led her to visit art galleries every weekend.
meanings.sent2: The school's artsiness was evident in the variety of clubs dedicated to different art forms.
meanings.sent3: His artsiness was contagious, inspiring his friends to take up painting.
meanings.sent4: The artsiness of the community was celebrated during the annual arts festival.
meanings.sent5: The artsiness of the city could be seen in the vibrant street art and live performances.
